title: AITA: Is He An A*Hole For Creating This Database Of Women At His University?
description:
Every week we dive DEEP into the AITA (Am I The A*hole) thread on Reddit, and it’s FASCINATING.
It’s a bunch of real-life scenarios people are in where they could EASILY be the a*hole, but maybe – just maybe – once you hear all the details, you’ll understand it a little better and they won’t be SO much of an a*hole! Or maybe not.
Up today: In college, he created a database about the women who attended his university. The database was full of information about these women's interests.
A friend of his wanted to add to the database, and from there, it spread to over 40 men. Is he wrong for creating this?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
